title: How to Choose a Convenient and Comfortable City Life - Riding Airwheel Mini Mobility Self Balancing.
text: How to Choose a Convenient and Comfortable City Life - Riding Airwheel Mini Mobility Self Balancing. The traffic problems in large cities have haunted many people. It seems that the convenient and comfortable city life are realized only when these traffic problems are solved. Luckily, choosing Airwheel intelligent scooters will help people get the city life they want. USA, 18 September 2015 -- Generally speaking, modern cities have given people the thrills never existing before. But the metropolis have also brought people the severe traffic problems—traffic jam, air pollutions and noises. Are there any new vehicles which will solve these traffic problems for people? Fortunately, Airwheel has brought people the innovative intelligent scooters which will greatly change the awkward situations in city traffic. Airwheel Q5 twin-wheeled intelligent scooters are the newest model in Airwheel Q series products. The twin wheels of Q5 are the guarantee of the stability and smoothness while riding Q5. The operating system inside Q5 is developed and has been tested thousands of times by Airwheel to make it a perfect system. Airwheel’s being no negotiate in any detail of the system makes the system more advanced than others. The system contains various functions to make the riding experiences of Q5 more intelligent and convenient. Also, the system provides riders with the comprehensive protection functions. Most importantly, Airwheel Q5 has the response time 0.01 sec shorter than other electric scooters, which makes Q5 the user-friendly vehicles to be controlled as easy as people’s body parts.The top-quality units of Airwheel Q5 are also the guarantee of people’s good riding experiences. The battery cores from Sony or Panasonic provide riders with long range. The resin shells of Q5 are light yet solid and durable to protect the vehicle units inside. The motor is noise-free maglev motor which is extremely efficient. Also, the most significant vehicle module is the LED lights which is adopted the first time in electric scooters and highlights riders’ ridings. All the vehicle units are assembled in the small vehicle body. The small size and light weight of Q5 make citizens easy to carry and ride them anywhere. The traffic problems will cause no troubles to Q5 riders. The solution of city traffic problems is to find another way for traveling. Airwheel Q5 is the new choice for citizens to avoid the traffic problems and have a better city life. # # #
